department: Early Care and Early Childhood Studies (Teacher Certification)
program: Early Care and Early Childhood Studies (Teacher Certification)

courses.title: Communication (Core)
courses.prerequisite: For all 010 courses: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Option: ENGL 1301.

courses.title: American History (Core)
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: HIST 1301 or HIST 2327.

courses.title: College Algebra
courses.prerequisite: College Ready TSI status in Mathematics.
courses.notes: College Ready TSI status in Mathematics or MATH 0314/0332/0342.

courses.title: Creative Arts
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options.

courses.title: Integrative/Experiential Learning Option (Core)
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options.

courses.title: 1301 Learning Framework; 1101 Academic and Career Success; 1001 Living and Working by Design
courses.notes: As required, based on credit hours earned, TSI status, High School rank, major declaration.

courses.title: Communication (Core)
courses.prerequisite: For all 010 courses: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: ENGL 1302 or ENGL 1305.

courses.title: American History (Core)
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: HIST 1302 or HIST 2328.

courses.title: Social and Behavioral Sciences (Core)
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options.

courses.title: Fundamentals of Mathematics I
courses.prerequisite: Minimum grade of 'C' in one of the following: MATH 1314, MATH 1414, MATH 2412, or MATH 2413.
courses.notes: Prerequisite to Teacher Education Program Admission.

courses.title: Integrative/Experiential Learning Option (Core)
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options.

courses.title: Life and Physical Sciences (Core)
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options. If taking lab, earn 1 hr applied to Integrative/Experiential Learning. See degree plan for details.

courses.title: Life and Physical Sciences (Core)
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options. See degree plan for details.

courses.title: Fundamentals of Mathematics II
courses.prerequisite: MATH 1350 with a grade of 'C' or better.
courses.notes: Prerequisite to Teacher Education Program Admission.

courses.title: Science for Elementary Teachers I
courses.prerequisite: Must be a declared major in the following College of Education and P-16 Integration programs: BS Education, BS Special Education, and BS Early Care and Early Childhood Studies (Teacher Certification).
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Language, Philosophy & Culture (Core)
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options.

courses.title: History Foundations for Elementary Social Studies Educators
courses.prerequisite: Grade of 'C' or better in HIST 1301 and HIST 1302. Must be a declared major in the following College of Education and P-16 Integration programs: BS Education, BS Special Education, and BS Early Care and Early Childhood Studies (Teacher Certification).
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Science for Elementary Teachers II
courses.prerequisite: Must be a declared major in the following College of Education and P-16 Integration programs: BS Education, BS Special Education, and BS Early Care and Early Childhood Studies (Teacher Certification).
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Early Literacy Development
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement.

courses.title: Human Development and Student Learning
courses.prerequisite: Admission to the College of Education EC-6 Teacher Education Program.

courses.title: Designing and Implementing Instruction and Assessment
courses.prerequisite: Admission to the College of Education EC-6 Teacher Education Program.

courses.title: Foundations of Early Childhood Education
courses.prerequisite: Admission to the COE Teacher Preparation Program.

courses.title: Guidance of Young Children
courses.prerequisite: Admission to the COE Teacher Preparation Program.

courses.title: Inclusion and Differentiated Instruction in Special Education
courses.prerequisite: Admission to Teacher Prep if education major. No prereq if non-education major.

courses.title: Teaching Science to Elementary Students
courses.prerequisite: EDCI 3331 and EDCI 3332

courses.title: Teaching Mathematics to Elementary Students
courses.prerequisite: EDCI 3331 and EDCI 3332

courses.prerequisite: Admission to the CEP Educator Preparation Program or consent of instructor for non-education major.

courses.prerequisite: Admission to CEP Educator Preparation Program or consent of instructor for non-education major.

courses.title: Administration of Child Development Centers

courses.prerequisite: Admission to the CEP Educator Preparation Program or consent of instructor for non-education major.

courses.prerequisite: READ 3320

courses.title: Student Teaching for Elementary Teachers (EC-6) or Clinical Teaching Residency I for Elementary Teachers (EC-6) and Clinical Teaching Residency II for Elementary Teachers (EC-6)
courses.prerequisite: Admission to the College of Education Student Teaching Program or Admission to the College of Education Clinical Teaching Residency Program.
courses.notes: All Education courses must be completed prior to admission to Clinical Teaching. Passing identified TExES certification exams is required before EDCI 4637. Must be taken last semester. Only offered Fall or Spring.
